How many people are affected by atypical hemolytic-uremic syndrome ?,"The incidence of atypical hemolytic-uremic syndrome is estimated to be 1 in 500,000 people per year in the United States. The atypical form is probably about 10 times less common than the typical form.",GHR,atypical hemolytic-uremic syndrome
